title: Suddenly DC'd, Couldn't Re-Connect, Game Doesn't Exist...
body:
I was playing an ARAM game, ping was perfectly stable, no lag issues. Then I just suddenly DC'd. Tried loading pages in my browser and they loaded just fine, issue was not with my Internet. I tried reconnecting and League kept crashing until I got a message telling me the game I was trying to connect to no longer existed (obviously ended) and when I looked at my match history the game is just... not there.

Rito pls, I'm so confused.

replies.body: I think this happened to me during the loading game screen, along with my whole team.
Drop hack, did it happen when the enemy or you was about to lose?

Eh, not entirely. I think we were pretty obviously winning because we'd just all in and then push faster than them, but we hadn't taken the inhib yet. I was just about to go in and then I got disconnected.
I had the same situation with you just 1 hous ago, when I go in DC'd, then no game history.
Same shit happened to me, sick of it.
